name: Iron Escape (Shek, Trikyname)
description:
How to play

You are a citizen of east Berlin. Escape to west Berlin. 

Avoid being detected by the lights, patrols and guards. Don't die stepping on mines.

WASD to move or Arrow Keys.

Created by:

Andreu Salvany - https://shek93.itch.io/

Alvaro Colom - https://trikyname.itch.io/

Free Assets Used

Explosion: http://cis-linux2.temple.edu/~sallyk/tutorials_js_animations/animation/02_explos...

Tilemap: https://kenney.nl/assets/rpg-urban-pack

Menu background image: https://wallpaperaccess.com/pixel-city

Music Theme:  Vogel im Kafig (Shingeki no Kyojin OST)

Sounds: https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/212429/

https://www.soundjay.com/beep-sounds-1.html

https://www.freesoundeffects.com/free-sounds/explosion-10070/
